purpose: The email is a call for participation in the EASE'25 conference, inviting researchers and practitioners to present and discuss their work.
evidence_sentences: Call for Participation (Main Conference + Workshops): EASE'25: 29th International Conference on Evaluation and Assessment in Software Engineering, June 17-20, 2025

The International Conference on Evaluation and Assessment in Software Engineering (EASE) provides a stimulating forum where researchers and practitioners can present and discuss recent research results on a wide range of topics.
